title: Pixel 5 YouTube scroll lag only in 90hz mode
content:
I've been using my Pixel 5 for a couple of days now, and I noticed that when I play a video on YouTube and minimize it (so that you can still play it at the bottom of the screen while searching for other videos), it makes the display stutter when I scroll through other videos. It only occurs when I'm scrolling while the video is still playing. Interestingly, it doesn't stutter when I scroll through recommended videos or comments. Also, I noticed that when I turn off 90hz display mode (both from the display setting and developer setting), it doesn't happen, meaning that when the display is at 60hz, this problem doesn't occur.

I tried rebooting the phone and I even tried the safe mode to see if any third-party app is causing the issue, but none of them worked. Does anyone experience the same issue, or does anyone know how to fix this problem?
